statements: SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT record_id, patient_name FROM health_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM health_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_records > 1;
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM health_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_name FROM health_records WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY age, record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'COVID%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, doctor, date FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT p.name, m.doctor, m.date FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.name, m.doctor, m.date FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Female' AND m.doctor LIKE '%Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT CONCAT(last_name, ', ', first_name) AS full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY gender, date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE gender = 'F'
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patient_Records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01'
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT result_id, test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 100
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Patient_Records WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patient_Records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_id, condition_name, diagnosis_date FROM Medical_Conditions JOIN Patient_Records ON Medical_Conditions.patient_id = Patient_Records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Medications WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY patient_id;

SELECT Patient_Records.name, Lab_Results.test_name, Lab_Results.result_value FROM Lab_Results JOIN Patient_Records ON Lab_Results.patient_id = Patient_Records.patient_id WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, symptoms FROM Visits WHERE symptoms LIKE '%fever%';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, r.specialty, l.test_name FROM Researchers r JOIN Lab_Results l ON r.researcher_id = l.result_id;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, t.medication, t.dosage, t.instructions FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.visit_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT visit_date, symptoms FROM Visits JOIN Patients ON Visits.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_id, medication, instructions FROM Treatments WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY treatment_id DESC;
SELECT test_name, result FROM Lab_Results JOIN Visits ON Lab_Results.visit_id = Visits.visit_id WHERE Visits.symptoms LIKE '%pain%';
